jd: From: Danish Mujeeb, Han Staffing danish@hanstaffing.com Reply to: danish@hanstaffing.com Title: Project Manager with Payments DomainLocation: Tampa, FL (Day 1 Onsite)Duration: Long Term Contract Job Description:Strong leadership and team management abilities.Coordination skill/ facilitation role across multiple groups is idealProficiency in project management software and tools (e.g., MS Project, Asana, Jira).Solid understanding of project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall).Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Track / follow-up and take things to closureHaving good communication.Ability to work with senior stakeholders with guidance from existing teamExperience in banking / payments (preferred)Coordinating and facilitating role across multiple groups is ideal Act as the primary point of contact for stakeholders, including clients, team members, and senior management. Communicate project progress, address concerns, and manage expectations. Ensure project deliverables meet quality standards and requirements
